body_text:
But if this isn’t about the request format, then the problem is similar to #7318. However, instead of IDEs like PyCharm, I was referring to editors like VS code or sublime. Their plugins won’t work.

Thank you.

Sincerely,
Zhao

body:
But if this isn’t about the request format, then the problem is similar to #7318. However, instead of IDEs like PyCharm, I was referring to editors like VS code or sublime. Their plugins won’t work.

Thank you.

Sincerely,
Zhao
